post.author: rich_is_bored
post.body:
I found this crazy program that looks very promising. It makes seamless animated textures.

http://www.texturemaker.com

I downloaded it and tried it out. The interface is a little overwhelming, kinda like photoshop was when I first started with it.

Of course that probably means the learning curve is steep so I don't think I'm going to play with it much.




I'm thinking if you were to use this in conjunction with photoshop or perhaps paint shop pro, you could make some awesome materials and particle effects.
